articles.title: A Maine man drove off with $7K on his roof. Police are seeking the man who scooped it up off the road.
articles.description:
"An older male was seen picking up approximately $7,400 in cash that had fallen from the roof of the car of its rightful owner," police said.

The post A Maine man drove off with $7K on his roof. Police are seeking the man who scooped it up off the road. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: A Maine man drove off with $7K on his roof. Police

articles.title: Bruins lose 4th straight, fall to Mammoth 3-2
articles.description:
The Bruins finished 0-3 on their Western Conference road trip and lost their fourth straight overall. Boston has allowed 17 goals over the last four games.

The post Bruins lose 4th straight, fall to Mammoth 3-2 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Bruins lose 4th straight, fall to Mammoth 3-2
